name: Valentine Forest With...
description:
SYNOPSIS

You invited her to have some fun away from the horrors of the current state of affairs. And suddenly, you're stuck in a forest...

WHAT IS THIS?

This is a very short, unofficial fangame made with RPG Maker MV based on the game "World of Horror" developed by panstasz. However, it makes no explicit mention of the characters or events of that game. It'll take less than 5-15 minutes to finish. 

It was made in a week.You can also call it a kusoge.

Also, yes. There's almost no BGM. Only once is there a BGM playing, and it's during the battle that's pretty much impossible to lose. (There's no trick; just brute force.)

HOW TO PLAY OFFLINE

You may download the whole game to play on Windows in the associated ZIP file below. Extract and follow the directory or instructions to play. (The uncompressed size on Windows when extracted is about 370 MB.)

IMPORTANT
- No files from World of Horror were processed, manipulated, or modified to create assets for this game.
- This game is an unofficial fangame and has no connection with panstasz, ysbryd games, or any other entity or individual related to the creation and release of World of Horror.
- This game is a non-commercial, free project. No capital, monetary gain, or compensation was received in its making or release.

CREDITS (Also included in a credits.txt file when downloading)

This game was made with RPG Maker MV.
Statement of Rights: “©2015 GOTCHA GOTCHA GAMES/YOJI OJIMA”
